com.ea.orbit.actors.runtime

Interface IReminderController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IActor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReminderController

    public interface IReminderController
extends IActor

        getReference, getReference

    • Method Detail

      • registerOrUpdateReminder

        Task<String> registerOrUpdateReminder(IRemindable actor,
                                      String reminderName,
                                      Date dueTime,
                                      long period,
                                      TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Adds or updates a reminder
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor that owns of the reminder
        reminderName - the name, used with actor as reminder key
        dueTime - the first time the reminder will trigger
        period - the period of the reminder after the first time.
        timeUnit - the time unit for period
        Returns:
        a task that returns the reminder name

      • unregisterReminder

        Task<String> unregisterReminder(IRemindable actor,
                                String reminderName)
        Cancels a reminder registration. It's not guaranteed that the reminder won't be called after this method a the invocation might have already being triggered
        Parameters:
        actor - the target actor
        reminderName - the reminder handle
        Returns:
        a task holding the reminder name.

      • getReminders

        Task<List<String>> getReminders(IRemindable actor)
        Gets all reminders tied to the actor actor.
        Parameters:
        actor - the target actor
        Returns:
        a task holding the list of reminder names.

      • ensureStart

        Task<Void> ensureStart()
